sentences.sContent: I fended off his sword thrust with my spear.
sentences.sCn: 他一刀砍来， 我拿枪架住。

sentences.sContent: He transfixed the enemy's heart with a spear.
sentences.sCn: 他用长矛刺穿了敌人的心脏。

sentences.sContent: Yes,of course. My shield is the strongest.It can stop any spear in the world.
sentences.sCn: 当然是了。我的盾是最结实的，它能抵挡住世界上任何矛。

trans.tranOther: a pole with a sharp pointed blade at one end, used as a weapon in the past
